title: A true and just relation of Maj. Gen. Sir Thomas Morgan's progress in France and Flanders with the six thousand English, in the years 1657 and 1658, at the taking of Dunkirk and other important places as it was deliver'd by the general himself.
author: Morgan, Thomas, Sir, d. 1679?
notes: The attribution to Morgan has been questioned.  Cf. Cambridge hist. of Eng. lit., 1920, v. VII, p. 452.
Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
